body_html: Why should I go for a complicated way? The high-level api should come with such methods. Every framework which is a high level api, for example keras or lasagne, comes with such a nice way to set the weights for each layer independently
body_text: Why should I go for a complicated way? The high-level api should come with such methods. Every framework which is a high level api, for example keras or lasagne, comes with such a nice way to set the weights for each layer independently
